channel.title: Random exp lamp
channel.description:
I need to know how i would add a lamp to give 10k exp to a random skill. I think I need to use Ints but i haven't learnt them yet :|
So far i have:
[code] case 7498: deleteItem(7498,1); break; [/code] Now all i need is the part that adds exp :P
-Mark- :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 29, 2009, 04:30:02 pm[/size][hr]anyone?
